items.sentence: The detective found absolute proof of the man\'s guilt.
The doctor says that I\'ll never be able to swim again.
Tom double-checked his door to make sure it was locked.
Tom drank three cups of coffee before he left for work.
Tom drives a truck and his wife drives a station wagon.
I didn\'t let Tom know that I knew how to speak French.
I didn\'t realize Tom was such a close friend of yours.
I didn\'t think I was ever going to be this successful.
I didn\'t understand what the writer was trying to say.
I didn\'t want Tom to go to Boston, but he went anyway.
Tom doesn\'t remember his first French teacher\'s name.
Tom started to say something, but Mary interrupted him.
Tom stepped forward to kiss Mary, but she stepped back.
Tom stomped on the brake pedal and screeched to a halt.
Tom takes a walk almost every morning before breakfast.
Tom thought it would be dangerous for Mary to go alone.
A lot of people say Tom is the best player on our team.
After the work day was over, Tom went home to his wife.
Americans have to spend hours figuring out their taxes.
I don\'t think I\'ll stay until the end of the concert.
